product_name: Patagonia Merino 1 Silkweight Crew Long Underwear Top - Men's
long_description: From the hiking trail to the treadmill, the men's Patagonia Merino 1 Silkweight Crew Long Underwear Top offers versatile performance in warm weather when it's too hot for heavier base layers. Jersey-knit merino wool provides superior softness and odor-resistant performance; wool is processed without the use of chlorine. Polyester enhances moisture-wicking and quick-drying performance and increases durability. Set-in sleeves eliminate shoulder seams for increased range of motion and comfort. Side seams are offset to minimize abrasion and irritation. Elastic thumb loops for secure hand coverage. Slim fit. Machine wash the Patagonia Merino 1 Silkweight T-shirt with cold water; tumble dry on low.
